headline.main: AP Explains: How Immigrants Are Detained, Deported
headline.print_headline: AP Explains: How Immigrants Are Detained, Deported

lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump has made headlines with his swift action on immigration and vows to deport those living in the U.S. illegally who have a criminal past. Now any immigrant charged or convicted of any offense, or even suspected of a crime, has become an enforcement priority for federal authorities.
